title: italic fat face w/swashes on Jacqueline Susann book cover
content:
I'm looking for a font similar to this...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021000459im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typesample_4545.jpg)
author: lthe

comments.content:
It's almost Annlie Extra Bold Italic, but not quite. I swear I've seen that 'g' before.

- Lex
I'm with you, Lex: when I first looked at it, it reminded me of a Bodoni, although I haven't found one that matches either.
Anyone else think they might have been better off not using the swash N for "Not"? :)

It's possible this one hasn't been digitised yet, but maybe you might like [Cabernet](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021000459/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0000071) or [Cavetto](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021000459/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0001000).
